reviewText: Had to upgrade from VHS to DVD

I have to admit, as a teen surrounded by overcrowded copycatting, same, watered down, movies and music. Master P defied the norm of being a rapper and releasing nothing but hustle movies.
He has comedy, he has hustle/gansta, and he has this No Tomorrow, an action thriller (and as a bonus, the Game of Life is included.

I bought this dvd & was very pleased with it (a must for Master P, Snoop Dogg, & no limit soldiers fans)
I rated this dvd a 5 (EXCELLENT)

no tomorrow is a pretty good film with lots of action

it is directed by master p who also has a part in the film.

da game of life is a mixture of gangsta films rolled into one,

it is very slick and worth watching if you like snoop

IF YOU LIKE NO LIMIT GET THIS
